name: Breakfast Simulator
description:
A simple kitchen sandbox; toast bread, fry eggs, and make tea to your heart's content.

I used the Leap Motion Controller briefly for another project but this is my first time developing with the Oculus Rift, I was very impressed with the way the two technologies complemented each other.

Didn't get as many features in as I wanted (coursework got in the way) but I'm quite pleased with what I have.

Feedback is appreciated, hope you enjoy!

(Edit: Was getting strange errors concerning Oculus .dlls crashing, have updated to use the default Unity launcher and it seems to work better now.)

Credits;

Matthew (@johnjoemcbob)

Thanks to Sean (@_Inu_) for letting me borrow his DK2!
